title: Duik Ángela

assets.name: Duik_Angela*.zip
assets.description:
Read the installation instructions in the [comprehensive documentation](http://duik.rxlab.guide).
You can also [watch this tutorial](https://rxlaboratory.org/duik-angela-installation-getting-started-en/) to install and get started with Duik.
Vous pouvez aussi regarder le [tutoriel de découverte et d'installation](https://rxlaboratory.org/duik-angela-installation-decouverte-fr/) de Duik en français.

assets.name: Duik_API*.zip
assets.description:
Use the API to create your own scripts including features from Duik.
[The complete reference is available here](http://duik.rxlab.io).

description: The comprehensive rigging and animation toolkit for Adobe After Effects.
